item.title: Temporal vs K8s Controller: Declarative vs Imperative Control Plane Paradigms
item.description: K8s Controllers and Temporal are both “control plane” technologies, but they represent fundamentally different design philosophies. This post deep-dives into their core differences and explores how to combine them in AI Infra platforms.
